metadata.title: CVE-2016-6175 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Eval injection vulnerability in php-gettext 1.0.12 and earlier allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via a crafted plural formsheader.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-6175` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-php-gettext - 1.0.12-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-gettext package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.12-1').
